title: Can you fix chat boxes so i'm not forced to type into them
body:
So basically after the patch i have noticed one thing that is really damn annoying.

Now as a bit of context i use a push to talk button for most of the voice programs i go on, and as of this moment, you can't actually click out of the chat boxes in league as it will just force you back into typing in them.

This is fairly annoying honestly, and should be changed back to what it was.
